testcase.title: 001)Check Chinese locale is displayed on CLV Image for localization

steps.title: I logged in as a "Localization" user with access to "CE-4" project

substeps.message: New Home page logged in  properly and Locale Icon is Displayed

steps.title: the "HomePage" page should be loaded on log on with Locale Dropdown
I verify "Chinese" language should listed under the Locale Dropdown and Select check-box against Chinese

substeps.message: Competitive Landescape Viewer pageLoaded Properly With Chinese Text

steps.title: I Verify locale China on CLV "CLViewerImage"

substeps.message: On 'CLViewerImage' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'homepage.explore.image.title.dashboard' with the key 'homepage.explore.image.title.dashboard' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ?????? and the Content displayed on UI Competitive landscape viewer are NOT matching

steps.title: I Verify locale China for CLV "CLViewerImage"
